DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To assess group post-lingually child 10 year implantation regard speech perception , speech intelligibility , academic/occupational status . Study Design : A prospective transversal study . Setting : Pediatric referral center cochlear implantation . Patients : Ten post-lingually deafened child Nucleus Med-El cochlear implant . Interventions : Speech perception speech intelligibility test interview . Main Outcome Measures : The main outcome measure score Hint sentence recognition ( silence noise ) , speech intelligibility score ( write-down intelligibility rating scale score ) academic/ occupational status .
DOC.brief_title: Cochlear Implants Post-lingually Children : Results After 10 Years
DOC.criteria: postlingually deaf age cochlear implant : < 18 year 10 year cochlear implant use disability
